properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu deniki shilpiyunu nirmaanakudai Yunnaado aa pattaname naa guri naa Jeevitha kaala manthaa Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya Halleluya{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jalamulu naapai lechinanu jalamulapai ne velledanu Janamulu nannedirinchinanu jayashaali prabhu jayamitchiun{/lang-eng}
